src:
Achraf Hakimi: Tersisih di Madrid, Jadi Mesin Gol Dortmund di Liga Champions
06 Nov 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund sudah mencetak lima gol dalam empat pertandingan di Liga Champions musim ini. Empat dari lima gol itu disumbangkan oleh bek sayap kanan 21 tahun Maroko, Achraf Hakimi, yang notabene merupakan pemain pinjaman dari Real Madrid.
Borussia Dortmund menjamu Inter Milan di Signal Iduna Park pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019). Sempat tertinggal 0-2, Dortmund akhirnya berbalik menang 3-2.
Inter menutup babak pertama dengan keunggulan 2-0 lewat gol-gol Lautaro Martinez menit 5 dan Matias Vecino menit 40. Dortmund membalikkan skor melalui gol Achraf Hakimi menit 51, Julian Brandt menit 64, dan gol kedua Hakimi menit 77.
Hakimi menjadi mesin gol Dortmund di Liga Champions musim ini. Berkat dia, Dortmund mampu bersaing di grup yang sulit ini.
text:
Achraf Hakimi: Left out in Madrid, Dortmund goal machine in the Champions League
Nov 6 2019, 15:02 by Bola.net
Borussia Dortmund have scored five goals in four matches in the Champions League this season. Four of the five goals were contributed by 21-year-old Moroccan right-back, Achraf Hakimi, who incidentally is a loan player from Real Madrid.
Borussia Dortmund host Inter Milan at Signal Iduna Park on Matchday 4 in Group F of the 2019/20 Champions League, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Got behind 0-2, Dortmund finally turned 3-2 win.
Inter closed the first half with a 2-0 advantage with goals from Lautaro Martinez in the 5th minute and Matias Vecino in the 40th minute. Dortmund reversed the score through Achraf Hakimi's 51th minute goal, Julian Brandt 64th minute, and Hakimi's second goal 77th minute.
Hakimi became Dortmund's goal machine in the Champions League this season. Thanks to him, Dortmund are able to compete in this difficult group.
